contract_description: This Procurement Contract is entered into between Chirayan Constructions and Plasma Corporation.
objective: To establish the terms and conditions for the procurement of products/services from Chirayan Constructions by Plasma Corporation.
pricing_and_payment_terms: Product A: $10 per unit; Product B: $20 per unit; Product C: $30 per unit. Payment Terms: The Buyer shall make payments to the Supplier within 30 days from the receipt of a valid invoice. Payment Method: Payments shall be made via bank transfer.
delivery_terms: Not explicitly specified in the contract text.
quality_assurance: Not explicitly specified in the contract text.
termination_clause: Either party may terminate this Contract with 30 days written notice to the other party. Either party may terminate this Contract immediately in the event of a material breach by the other party.
